ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Feeling kinda useless sometimes
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Jacana!  You ARE awfully cute.  :)  I ll have to try that with my favorite complaining Cleric. - /em blushes fiercely Awww your a sweetie to say so.... I
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, Jacana! You ARE awfully cute. :) I'll have to try that with my
favorite complaining Cleric.

- /em blushes fiercely
Awww your a sweetie to say so....

I am sure your cleric would just love you for that little trick....

Only one this time, but it was Kelin's Lute! Also got an Imbrued Bracer,
which I will proudly wear, even though the Lambent is better.

- You'll have to stop by some time with your clothes on so I can see :)

Is the Sarnak Fort good for level 24s? I want to find someplace in Lake
of Ill Omen where my Warrior can sit for a few levels. She's too darned
slow to move around.

- I hunted at the Lake till level 27(makes that song so long ago...) so
exp around the whole area is good. If you want a full group of 24 and up
the back door of the fort would be fine. If you have a damn good group
storm it (we did - and I remember dragging corpses too..). If you can only
find one or two people the water ruins are a great pull spot. The ones that
are a marker of sorts for the FM zone. There's plenty of blues to yellows
there.

If you have any questions about the lower levels of Kunark let me know :)
I have been living there since 16. And 11 of those levels were spent at the
Lake. The other two in Frontier Mountains.

Jacana Mourningsong
Wood Elf of the 29th Song
<Crimson Dragons> on Innoruuk



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
